fine!...however the fundoshi is still eluding me...I am using Netscape

messages.messageBody:
Firuze wrote:

> There are two (apparently) broken links (the film incarnations of Shinsengumi and the third page of the photos' section, but I guess the actual pages might not be ready, so I only comment it just in case they actually are.) The rest of the site can be seen without a problem. Very good, btw... *thumbs up*>>
>

Gives Gates' demon browser a most unladylike and rude hand gesture. Ha!
conquered you---more or less. The links you mentioned have no pages yet
to go with them. I was just trying to get a step ahead of the
game--probably a bad idea but what they hey, I'm a total amateur.

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Website fixed-- I think
messages.msgSnippet: Hi... I ve seen the whole site in three diferent browsers (Opera 7.23, IE6 and Mozilla Firefox 0.8) and now the photos load perfectly. There are two
messages.messageBody:
Hi...
I've seen the whole site in three diferent browsers (Opera 7.23, IE6 and Mozilla Firefox 0.8) and now the photos load perfectly. There are two (apparently) broken links (the film incarnations of Shinsengumi and the third page of the photos' section, but I guess the actual pages might not be ready, so I only comment it just in case they actually are.) The rest of the site can be seen without a problem. Very good, btw... *thumbs up*
Hope this helps
Firuze
